about_body: Korp is the concordance search tool of Spr√•kbanken (The Swedish Language Bank), adapted to the Language Bank of Finland. For more information, comments, suggestions, bug reports or other feedback, please fill in the feedback form or send email to fin-clarin (at) helsinki.fi.
about_adapt: Adapting Korp to the Language Bank of Finland
corpusinfo_descr_status_beta: Please note that the corpus is in beta testing, so it may change without notice.
corpusinfo_descr_status_test: Please note that the corpus is still in the test stage, so it may change significantly without notice.
